thread.title: Can You Name Country From The Countries It Borders
thread.title_full: Can You Name The Country From The Countries It Borders

author: Robin Edds
title: Can You Name Country From The Countries It Borders
text:
Note: this quiz talks about LAND BORDERS only, and bridges or man made causeways are not considered land borders. ID: 10574983 1. Which country is bordered by ONLY... Guess I give up! Netherlands The Netherlands Holland Netherlands 2. Which country is bordered by... Guess I give up! Finland Finland 3. Which country is bordered by... Guess I give up! Pakistan Pakistan 4. Which country is bordered solely by... Guess I give up! Canada Canada 5. Which country is bordered by... Guess I give up! Chile Chile 6. Which country is bordered by... Guess I give up! UK United Kingdom the uk the united kingdom great britain britain northern ireland United Kingdom 7. Which country is bordered by... Guess I give up! Indonesia Indonesia 8. Name a country that is bordered by ONLY... Guess I give up! Nepal Bhutan Butan nepal and bhutan nepal bhutan bhutan nepal bhutan and nepal Nepal OR Bhutan 9. Which country is bordered by... Guess I give up! Somalia Somalia 10. Which country is bordered by... Guess I give up! Andorra Andora Andorra 11. Which country is bordered by... Guess I give up! Greece Greece 12. Which country is bordered solely by... Guess I give up! Denmark Denmark A bridge connects Denmark to Sweden, but this is not considered a land border.
13. Which country is bordered by ONLY... Guess I give up! Mongolia Mongolia 14. Which country is bordered solely by... Guess I give up! Lesotho Lesoto Lessoto Lesotto Lesotho 15. Name a country that is bordered by ONLY... Guess I give up! San Marino Vatican City Vatican San Marino OR Vatican City 16. Which country is bordered by... Guess I give up! Colombia Columbia Colombia 17. And finally, which country is bordered by... Guess I give up! Russia Russia Can You Name The Country From The Countries It Borders? SHARE YOUR RESULTS ID: 10574631
Robin Edds is editor-at-large at BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
